website_summaries.verdict: These tough-looking pads are designed to protect the youngest skaters.
pros: Includes one pair of knee pads and one pair of elbow pads
Cushioned with hard plastic outer shell
Designed for kids ages 18 months to 5 years
Hook-and-loop closure straps are easy for kids to fasten
Fits children of average size and weight well
Protects well against typical toddler and preschooler injuries
cons: Fastening straps must be threaded through an eyelet, which is difficult for kids in the intended age group

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! So confusing trying to fit kids but bought this set and happily it worked. They were comfortable for her and they fit a 7yr. old, 40lb. (petite & thin) child, as they said....these are adjustable! The knee pads do tend to slide down a little after a lot of skating so just be aware of that and have your child pull them back up. These are a definite must, took a couple of good hits, did their job, and are still solid.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good deal but the elbow pads rub with a very stiff fabric and my daughters arm was bleeding within a few minutes. We do use all the other pads and they work great. We haven’t had a bad wreck though.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. The wrist pads are a little bulky but she didn't mind. It really increased her confidence while learning to ride without training wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good quality! Come with a bag to storage all the pieces. They seem sturdy and cute for a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Gonzalez Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, look great, and have prevented many skinned knees and elbows.
customer_reviews.author: MPR

customer_reviews.title: Nice and
customer_reviews.text: Fully protected my daughter she fell several times and never got hurt. Nice and padded
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 3 years old daughter and she is pretty tall.
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be too big for my 3 years old daughter and she is pretty tall.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what she needed...
customer_reviews.text: These work great for our daughter. They seem to fit ok and provide her with the protection we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid does not like it while riding,so never used.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great gear and Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves them. They are durable and easy on and off. Great gear and Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanagal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 5 yr old. They are comfortable and have enough adjustment for my smaller than avg child. Her range of motion is not limited in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Lampart

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but very small
customer_reviews.text: Good deal but very small!! Meant for very little kids. My daughter is a big 6 and these were to small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn't complain about it, she used to complain about the other safety gears we bought for her.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made.. Impressed with the quality and materials used.
customer_reviews.author: L.D

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The straps are too short for a 10 yr. old average size kid.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: My kids don’t like to wear this gear
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was breathable. My kids don’t like to wear this gear. The wrist guard is the only one I would buy again. The the Velcro already coming apart and stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Alva Retes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fit. I was really pleased with these once i saw them. They are perfect for the 4 year old I got them for and she wears them rollerskating.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Albright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid pads, a little big for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: trawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little bit older for my three children, but I think it will fit well next year.
customer_reviews.author: BAE EUN JIN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These items fits for children 5 y.o and above. It is too big for 2-4 y.o.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to wear it during her ice skating practice.
customer_reviews.author: leyou

customer_reviews.title: they are perfect! Nice material and come in a nice little ...
customer_reviews.text: these are just the cutest! I got them for a friends daughter who got roller blades for her birthday, they are perfect! Nice material and come in a nice little storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For fast growing kids, this may not be ideal as it will put alot of marks the back.
customer_reviews.author: DongSop Norman

customer_reviews.title: I'm super bugged that JBM International chose to be dishonest with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dishonest product description. I don't know why I fell for it except that I was hopeful. These dolls were advertised as "the mermaid collection". I don't know enough about LOL dolls to know if there is or isn't an actual mermaid series. But, even if there is, the ones I got weren't mermaids. I ended up paying more for the two I purchased because I was hoping to get a mermaid for my daughter. I'm super bugged that JBM International chose to be dishonest with what they are selling. I could have saved $6 total and paid the standard $9.99 for an LOL doll at the store and taken my chances. I HATE being lied to.
customer_reviews.author: tonia t conger

product_meta.title: JBM Kids & Adults Knee and Elbow Pads with Wrist Guards Protective Gear Set, Impact Resistance for your Children Outdoor Activities’ Adventure, Roller Skating, Cycling, Scooter, Skateboarding Pads Set
feature_bullets: PREMIUM MATERIALS CHOOSE FOR YOUR CHILDREN’S SAFETY JOURNEY - Knee and Elbow Pads with Wrist Guards for dangerous sport activities for your Boys and Girls. The 4 Layers Structure build for extra and extra protection for the Kids Knees, arms and your Hands! Our material of the hard pads is made of Supper durable and impact resistance PVC materials. The soft sponge is also built between the Pads and the Fabric to reduce the impact suffered by then Knee and Arm.

WHAT ABOUT THE FORTH LAYERS!? The Forth Layers is reason why we are different from others. No matter how perfect the pads and sponge others pads are, but the problem is it should fit the size of the knee and elbow but also maintain the position of the correct place to prevent any accident. The forth layers is the fabric with straps to allow your Children not only use them but to wear them securely.

LAST SAVIOR - Wrist Guards. Can you imagine what’s the first thing your children would do when they fall down during the rollerskating, biking, skateboarding or playing scooter? They will use the hands to prevent their head or body out of the ground or kind of sharp things such as stone? Wrist Guards is built with Leather, Fabric, and also the hard bar made from Durable PVC. Your kids can use the wrist guards to protect not only the wrist, but also prevent the damage to the body and the head.

WE HAVE BETTER QUALITY THAN OTHERS!? Another Reasons why we are different from others is the processing of making these pads, For the pads out there, they normally use very low quality materials to do the pads and fabric, that is fine if only the pads is not made so thick or from bad materials. However, did you ever think the most dangerous thing come from the pads inside. Normally the pads need the tacks to fix the position with the fabric, but the low quality pads will not take care about the

JUST SEARCH OUR JBM PROTECTIVE GEAR SET! More than thousands of reviews and history from selling protection related products, from Helmet to Knee pads, elbow pads and Wrist Guards. We never let our customers down! Thousands of Thousands Users and Parents are telling you we are the brand with trust.
